Digital Business Cards: New Age Professional Networking Solution of 2022

The whole world is turning digital in every area of life and commerce. In the world of business, visiting cards made of paper are an established way of networking which is popular even today. Yet with this huge drive towards everything virtual this prevailing method is set to change too. With this new norm to go digital and conduct business, a major part of networking, seminars, and conferences today have a virtual alternative. 

With most of us working remotely from home, there is an intensifying reliance on technology, along with the need to go online. Hence, digital business cards are emerging as the tech-forward innovation that is fast replacing the traditional paper visiting cards. Taking the business world by storm, these electronic virtual cards come with many advantages, which is perhaps the reason they are becoming a favorite in the business world.

 

What is a digital business card? 

It is an electronic or virtual card that can be shared online. 

Features of digital business cards:

  • All digital business cards are contactless. So, in times where social distancing is mandatory, online meetings and virtual events have become the new norm. This is making virtual business cards a regular part of everyday life. Digital business cards are free of physical contact.
  • It is easy to create digital business cards that can be customized and designed with as much information as one wants to share. Unlike the conventional paper visiting cards, there is no space constraint on electronic business cards
  • They are convenient. Electronic cards are budget-friendly. There is never any worry of printing the cards which escalate the budgets. 
  • Any mistake on the virtual card can be rectified and/or updated with minimal cost without the worry of an entire batch going to waste. 
  • ‍Digital business cards are affordable and it helps you to remain on your network’s radar, unlike the traditional visiting cards that one can easily lose.
